mapper.select: select * from houseinfo where lat between #{qa} and #{pa} and lng between #{ha} and #{oa} limit 1000

select c.name, c.address, c.weekday, c.saterday, c.sunday, c.phonenumber, c.conv from corona c inner join (select * from dongcode where dongName is null) d on (left(c.sido,2) = left(d.sidoName, 2) and c.gugun = d.gugunName) where dongCode = #{gugun}

select h.name, h.address, h.phonenumber, h.type from hospital h inner join (select * from dongcode where dongName is null) d on (h.sido = left(d.sidoName, 2) and h.gugun = d.gugunName) where dongCode = #{gugun}
mapper.delete: delete from inter_area where userId = #{userid} and dongCode = #{dong}
mapper.insert: insert into inter_area(userId, dongCode, dongName) values(#{userId}, #{dongCode}, (select concat(sidoName,' ',IFNULL(gugunName,''),' ',IFNULL(dongName,'')) from dongcode where dongCode = #{dongCode}))
mapper.select: select * from starbucks order by st_distance_sphere(point(#{lng},#{lat}),point(lng,lat)) limit 1
select * from metro order by st_distance_sphere(point(#{lng},#{lat}),point(lng,lat)) limit 1
